name: Feraligatr
author: Ken Sugimori
flavor_text: When it bites with its massive and powerful jaws, it shakes its head and savagely tears its victim up.

abilities.name: Downpour
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a {W} Energy card from your hand.

attacks.name: Riptide
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each {W} Energy card in your discard pile. Then, shuffle those cards into your deck.
